changelog.title: Quiz Achievements Wired
changelog.description: QuizEngine now triggers achievements: first_quiz, perfect_score, quiz_master, persistence, speed_demon.

changelog.title: Quiz Stats Tracking
changelog.description: New localStorage tracking for quiz history, enabling cumulative achievement progress.

changelog.title: Quiz Engine System
changelog.description: New reusable quiz framework with gamified UI, house themes, achievements, and instant feedback.

changelog.title: 5 New Quizzes Added
changelog.description: CIA Triad, Linux Basics, Subnetting, AWS Fundamentals, and Windows Administration assessments.
